text: 24 Oras (pronounced as bente kwatro oras / ) is a Philippine television news broadcasting show broadcast by GMA Network. Originally anchored by Mel Tiangco and Mike Enriquez, it premiered on March 15, 2004, on the network's Telebabad line up, replacing Frontpage: Ulat ni Mel Tiangco. Tiangco, Enriquez and Vicky Morales currently serve as the anchors. ==Related pages== * List of accolades received by 24 Oras ==Other websites== * * * Category:Television programs
title: 24 Oras
